signup.title: Create an Account
signup.subtitle: Enter your information to create an account
signup.passwordMinLength: Password must be at least 8 characters

login.title: Sign In
login.subtitle: Enter your email and password to sign in to your account
login.termsText: By clicking continue, you agree to our

verification.title: Verify Your Email
verification.subtitle: We've sent a 6-digit code to
verification.didntReceive: Didn't receive the code? Check your spam folder
verification.successDescription: Your email has been verified successfully
verification.successDescriptionLogin: Your email has been verified successfully. Please log in to continue.
verification.errorDescription: Invalid or expired code. Please try again
verification.pleaseVerify: Please verify your email before continuing to onboarding
verification.standaloneSubtitle: Please verify your email address to continue
verification.checkEmailNote: A verification code has been sent to
verification.resendSuccessDescription: A new verification code has been sent to your email
verification.noEmailDescription: We couldn't find an email address to send the verification code to. Please sign up first.
verification.emailNotFoundDescription: This email address is not registered. Please sign up first.
verification.alreadyVerifiedDescription: Your email has already been verified. Redirecting...
verification.alreadyVerifiedDescriptionFull: Your email address has already been verified. You can log in now.
verification.brandSubtitle: Email verification helps us keep your account safe and secure

forgotPassword.title: Forgot Password?
forgotPassword.subtitle: Enter your email address and we'll send you a link to reset your password
forgotPassword.successDescription: We've sent a password reset link to your email address. Please check your inbox.
forgotPassword.checkSpamNote: If you don't see the email, please check your spam folder
forgotPassword.errorDescription: Unable to send reset link. Please try again later
forgotPassword.brandSubtitle: We'll help you regain access to your account securely

resetPassword.title: Reset Password
resetPassword.subtitle: Enter your new password below
resetPassword.passwordMinLength: Password must be at least 8 characters
resetPassword.successDescription: Your password has been reset successfully. You can now login with your new password.
resetPassword.errorDescription: Unable to reset password. The link may be invalid or expired.
resetPassword.invalidTokenDescription: This password reset link is invalid or has expired. Please request a new one.
resetPassword.expiredTokenDescription: This password reset link has expired. Please request a new one.
resetPassword.brandSubtitle: Choose a secure password to protect your account

toast.no_venue_access_desc: You don't have access to any establishment yet. Please contact your administrator.
toast.email_not_verified_desc: Please verify your email before logging in. Redirecting to verification page...
toast.signup_success: Account created successfully! Check your email for verification code
toast.signup_error_desc: Unable to create account. Please try again
toast.email_already_registered: Email already registered. Please login instead
toast.switch_venue_error_desc: Unable to switch venue. Please try again
toast.google_login_error_desc: Google login failed. Please try again
toast.password_reset_sent_desc: Check your email for instructions to reset your password
toast.password_reset_error_desc: Unable to send password reset link. Please try again
toast.password_reset_success_desc: You can now login with your new password
toast.password_reset_failed_desc: Invalid or expired reset link. Please request a new one
toast.password_too_weak: Password does not meet requirements. Please use a stronger password
